text:
uqBA rAdha#saH saqha mA#daqyaddhyai$ |
uqBA dAqtArA#viqShA(gm) ra#yIqNAmuqBA vAja#sya sAqtayE# huvE vAM ||
aqyaM tEq yOni#r. RuqtviyOq yatO# jAqtO arO#cathAH |
taM jAqnanna#gnaq A rOqhAthA# nO varddhayA raqyiM ||
agnaq AyU(gm)#Shi pavasaq A suqvOrjaqmiSha#M ca naH |
AqrE bA#dhasva duqcCunA$M ||
agnEq pava#svaq svapA# aqsmE varca#H suqvIrya$M |
dadhaqtpOSha(gm)# raqyiM - [  ] 18
